name: STACKS (carlosvega2607)
description:
Stack up the blocks as high as you can!

◉ Simple & Beautiful graphics designed
◉ Compete for the best score in the world

Stack Tower that very easy to kill time, and the most peoples played in 2017.

It is simple and convenient. You can tap screen to stacking the tower, for get more scores you need more higher stacks. You should attention the speed, because when the stack higher, the speed will be more fast. It is important to note that similar stack game on Google play has already gained more than 10 million downloads.
If you have many freeze times everyday, you should try to play this game to help you to kill time. Let’s stacking the highest stack tower, and show your colorful tower!

Features: 
- More colorful towers.
- There are some surprises after 10 combos.
- Feel time passed so quickly, when you stacking the stack.
- Funny effects and sounds.
- So addictive and extreme.
- Challenging and easy to learn.
